meaningMnemonic: <radical>Imperial</radical> <radical>clothes</radical> allow you to perform an ancient <kanji>attack</kanji> that cannot be repelled.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>attack</kanji>'s power is concentrated in the <reading>shoe</reading>s (しゅう) in this imperial outfit. You attack with your feet, kicking the enemy with your old, fancy shoes.
